productBaseInfoV1.title: Panasonic VIERA 50 Inches Full HD Plasma TH-P50V20 Television(TH-P50V20)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: The feature-rich Panasonic TH-P50V20 comes from the V Series Plasma televisions and brings in new age entertainment right in your living room. This Panasonic television has Full HD resolution display which is an ideal platform to play high definition games and watch Blu-ray movies. This Plasma TV from Panasonic comes with Internet support that increases your interaction with the TV. You can wirelessly connect to Internet as the TH-P50V20 is Wireless Ready (adaptor to be bought separately). If you lack a router at home, you can plug-in a LAN cable to this TV to enjoy faster Web connectivity. You need to connect the Full HDTV to a power source of AC 220 - 240 V, 50/60 Hz for it to function effectively. The energy consumption of the TH-P50V20 in operational mode is 415 W, while in standby mode, the television consumes 0.4 W of energy. Design Showcasing visuals in brilliant clarity is the 50 inch screen of this Plasma TV that has a native resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels. The slim bezel lining around the screen adds more elegance to the overall appearance of the TH-P50V20. The bundled stand with this Full HDTV can swivel up to 10 degrees to left and right so that you can move the device according to your convenience. When placed on the stand, the Panasonic TH-P50V20 measures 1224 x 810 x 335 mm and tips the scales at 29.5 kg. The screen of this Plasma Full HDTV is fitted with a G13 Progressive Full HD Neo Plasma Display Panel that eliminates glare and dual layered imaging from screen. You get widescreen cinema-like viewing experience as the TV is 16:9 aspect ratio. Video and Audio Equipped with several nifty video augmenting features, the Panasonic TH-P50V20 takes your TV viewing sessions to the next level. The Resolution Enhancer in the Plasma TV delivers crystal clear pictures, no matter what the source of the video is. Features like x.v.Color and Deep Color ensure that the color reproduction of the television is closer to the natural picture. The Panasonic TH-P50V20 comes with 2 built-in speakers that offer sound akin to the original source. These dual speakers provide powerful, surround sound with a combined audio power output of 20 W. For a theater-like audio experience, Panasonic has integrated the V-Audio ProSurround sound technology in this Full HDTV so that you receive distortion-free sound levels. Features and Connectivity Enriched with several connectivity terminals like 4 HDMI and 2 USB ports, the Panasonic Plasma TV simplifies your home entertainment setup. The TV is also packed with several proprietary features that heighten your interaction with the TH-P50V20. You can enjoy a slideshow of your memorable pictures by inserting an SD card in the TV through the VIERA Image Viewer feature. The VIERA Link technology allows you to interlink compatible gadgets using HDMI cable and control them all with the TV’s remote. The DLNA-certified Panasonic TV is bestowed with several other features like VIERA link, VIERA Cast. Buying Tips The Panasonic TH-P50V20 has a dynamic ratio of 5,000,000:1 that shows off deeper black and crisper white levels that result in brilliant color contrasted visuals. This 50 incher will be an ideal choice for your living room television. You can choose to either wall- or table-mount this television. For an uninterrupted view of the TV, ensure that the device is placed at least 10 feet away from your seating area.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Sony BRAVIA 32 inches HD LCD KLV-32BX350 Television(BRAVIA KLV-32BX350)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: The Sony 32BX350 is an exquisitely crafted television, with attention to details, that teams up with the latest technological advancements to provide you with the ultimate viewing experience. This BX350 Series television from Sony delivers crystal clear pictures, thanks to the HD resolution. The LCD TV boasts of several Eco Settings that help you cut down on energy usage. This HD LCD TV from Sony requires a power source of AC 110 - 240 V, 50/60 Hz to function efficiently. When active, the Sony 32BX350 consumes 73.11 W of energy which drops to less than 0.19 W in standby mode. Other power saving features such as PC Power Management, Idle TV Standby, Dynamic Backlight Control and Backlight Off Mode let you watch TV guilt-free. Design Sporting a 32 inch screen, the Sony 32BX350 has a screen resolution of 1280 x 768 pixels that display visuals in accurate vividness. With a wide-screen aspect ratio of 16:9, you are assured of theater-like viewing at home. The television comes with a square stand which when placed on it measures 790 x 534 x 193 mm and weighs 9.4 kg. Video and Audio The Sony 32BX350 is powered by a BRAVIA 3 Engine that processes the pictures to provide you with the best in class clarity and color, irrespective of the source of the image. The backlight of this LCD TV is handled by the CCFL technology. The quality of the visuals in the 32BX350 is further boosted by a Clear Resolution Enhancer. Inclusion of advanced video augmenting features such as Intelligent Picture PLUS, Digital Noise Reduction, MPEG Noise Reduction, Advanced Contrast Enhancer, 24P True Cinema, 3D Comb Filter and others take your viewing experience to the next level. Audio in the Sony 32BX350 is handled by 2 built-in speakers that have a total sound power output of 16 W that match up to the elegant visuals rendered by the TV. The presence of Dolby Digital technology processes the sound so that you receive noise-free audio. The Bass Booster in the LCD TV helps provide clear bass. Other audio enhancing features present in this Sony television are NICAM audio technology and Simulated Stereo. Features and Connectivity The Sony 32BX350 is laden with several connectivity features that let you connect to other AV devices conveniently and streamlines your home entertainment system. Through the USB port provided in this LCD television, you can connect pen drives and other USB compatible devices with ease to instantly enjoy movies, music and photos. The dual HDMI ports transfer high definition digital data at great speed. Also with the BRAVIA Sync technology, connect them through HDMI cables to enjoy greater power on your electronic devices and control them all with your TV remote. Other useful connectivity ports included in the Sony 32BX350 LCD TV are one each of Composite Video, Component Video Input, PC Audio In and Headphone Jack. For your convenience, this LCD HDTV from Sony is packed with features that simplify life. These include Sleep Timer, Game Mode, Picture in Picture, Teletext, Parental Control and OSD Language. You can also turn your TV to a radio, thanks to the FM Radio option in the Sony 32BX350. Relive the memories of your last vacation on the large TV screen by switching to its Picture Frame Mode that turns the Sony 32BX350 into a digital photo frame instantly. Buying Tips This 32 incher from Sony is an ideal fit for your bedroom. However, to enjoy a clear view of the LCD television, ensure you place the TV at a distance of 10 feet from your seating area. You can choose any corner of the room to tuck into and enjoy your favorite shows without any hindrance as the Sony 32BX350 has a wide viewing angle of 176 degree. Go ahead and dig yourself into a tub of ice-cream while you enjoy the latest movie on your TV.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Akai (40 inch) LED TV(L40B30)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: The television has come a long way from being a highly priced appliance that only a few could afford to an essential entertainment appliance that is found in almost all homes now. Akai, a Japanese electronics giant makes a variety of home appliances, with the prime focus on making and designing high quality audio and video products. Relax at home while watching your favorite television shows on the Akai L40B30 Television with its crystal clear clarity and thumping sound system. The Akai L40B30 is an LCD television which is able to support Full HD video formats which means you can watch Blu-ray discs or high definition TV channels at the best possible quality. Akai has designed this LCD television to have a low energy consumption, thus saving you money on your electricity bill over time. Design The Akai L40B30 LCD Full HD Television has a rectangular structure and features a thick border that surrounds this TV. Full HD allows you to watch movies at 1080 p quality on this massive 40 inch (102 cm) screen and not miss a thing. The stand of this Akai television fits easily in the bottom and provides a stable resting ground while taking minimum space. The outer body of the Akai L40B30 LCD 40 inches Full HD Television is made of high gloss premium body finish that is easy to wipe clean with a soft cloth. Video and Audio The Akai L40B30 Full HD Television is able to reproduce images in high definition with the help of the High Quality Scaling Engine Technology. This engine delivers crystal clear images while also ensuring color quality is maintained. Another technology incorporated in this 40 inch Akai television is the Dynamic Skin Correction with Motion Compensation that helps in skin color correction. Since skin color occupies a relatively large area in video signals, this feature sharpens the image and also compensates for motion so that the image remains clear. The Akai L40B30 LCD 40 inches Full HD Television is able to reproduce color accurately with 16.7 million display color. The screen has a 6 ms response time and uses the 3D Comb Filter to further enhance the clarity of the image. The Vivid Color Technology enhances the brightness of each individual color which results in sharper and clearer color reproduction. The clarity of the images reproduced is further improved with a dynamic ratio or advanced contrast ratio of 1,000,000:1. The audio quality on the Akai L40B30 LCD 40 inches Full HD Television is powerful and clear with features like Multimode Dynamic Noise Reduction and the 5 Band Graphic Equalizer. The speakers generate 400 W PMPO which is loud enough to fuel a house party with high quality dance tracks. The 3D surround sound carries the sound all around the room to provide surround sound effect while listening to music or watching movie. While gaming, hear every alert and background sound to react faster to constantly changing scenarios. Features and Connectivity The Akai L40B30 LCD Full HD Television allows you to connect various devices to it for seamless connectivity. Connect your external hard disk drive or a pen drive to the only USB port on the TV. This Akai television can read and play movies, music and screen photo images on your big screen from these USB devices. This feature is extremely useful as you now don't have to write the data on a DVD to play it on the television. The lone HDMI port on this Akai 40 inch television lets you connect your Blu-ray disc player, desktop computer or laptop. When connecting a computer the television will serve as the monitor for your computer. You can also play computer games on the television. The HDMI port can also be used to connect high-end gaming consoles like the PlayStation 3, Nintendo Wii and Xbox 360 for an unmatched gaming experience. The Auto Search Feature makes it easier to tune in television channels at the press of a button. The Adjustable Backlight feature ensures that the screen adjusts itself to the ambient light around it to make it comfortable to watch. The television comes with an AV cable that can be used to connect DVD players and other devices. Enjoy high definition movies and games on your Akai L40B30 LCD 40 inches Full HD Television and satiate your daily entertainment cravings.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Haier (18.5 inch) HD Ready LED TV(19T51)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: From Haier’s much revered range of high performance LCD TVs is this Haier 19T51 HD LCD TV. This 18.5 inch HD LCD TV integrates a number of innovative technologies and smart features, which are packed into a very slim, lightweight and a stylish body design, giving you the opportunity to enjoy all your favourite movies, TV shows and home videos at HD quality. This Haier HD LCD TV comes equipped with a power management system that keeps the operational power consumption on the lower side. With an AC 100 - 240 V, 50/60 Hz power supply, this LCD TV has an operational power consumption of 45 W and a super efficient 2 W when in standby. Design                             This high performance LCD TV from Haier features a stylish 18.5 inch full flat screen display which is much slimmer and lighter than conventional TVs of the same screen size. This 18.5 inch HD display has a display resolution of 1366 x 768 pixels and 16:9 aspect ratio that greatly contributes in maximizing your viewing pleasure. This LCD TV’s slim bezel helps draw more of attention to the viewing surface rather than the thick black border, while the reduced weight and compact dimensions lets you effortlessly wall mount the TV. Video and Audio Loaded with a host of advanced audio and video features, this Haier HD LCD TV offers great digital entertainment. The 3D Comb Filter helps to correct detail and colour loss and providing seamless and colourful pictures. This Haier LCD TV also comes with a highly effective LED backlight technology which illuminates the screen uniformly resulting in clear and lifelike pictures. This LED backlight further gives this LCD TV the ability to consume 40% less energy than conventional LCD TVs. The audio capability on this Haier HD LCD TV is possible through its integrated speaker system which works through 5 Sound Mode settings and an equalizer that gives you a wide range of variable audio output options. This precisely designed audio management system helps deliver top notch quality audio output to accompany its highly enhanced video quality. The inclusion of an efficient AVL or Auto Volume Leveler greatly adds to your viewing pleasure by keeping the volume levels on different programs on a constant and convenient level. This lets you enjoy TV programs without the annoyance of the volume fluctuations while switching channels. Features and Connectivity This 18.5 inch Haier LCD TV boasts a considerable assortment of external connectivity which helps to widen its range of functionality. The advent of a HDMI port lets you hook up external digital media devices like DVD players, Home Theatre systems or high-end gaming devices to the LCD TV. The specialised PC input gives you the option of converting this 18.5 inch LCD screen into your computer monitor and enjoy all your PC and laptop programs on a large screen. There is also the inclusion of a high-speed USB 2.0 port which let you directly play the digital media files including audio, video and image files from any USB enabled external storage device. For other connectivity options this LCD TV also features 2 Composite Video Inputs for VCR or low-end DVD players, Component Video Input for newer DVD players and an RF connection input.  Buying Tips One of the main factors apart from the budget to be considered before buying an LCD TV is dimensions the room for final placement of the TV. All LCD TVs have a minimum viewing distance depending on their display size, and so it is better to make sure that the shape and size of the room does not obstruct the viewing comfort or picture quality. This Haier HD LCD TV also adds a great deal to the aesthetic value of the room as its wall-mount feature helps save a lot of space and at the same time project an enhanced style statement. The LCD TV also comes with a detachable table stand which requires some room around the TV for ventilation and the ease of external connectivity. You can also use the HDMI connectivity to reduce the number of wires that run around the TV.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Sharp (40 inch) Full HD LED TV(LC40M550M)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Get set for good times when you have the SHARP LC40M550M that bundles in numerous interesting features. With advanced technologies packed into this television, your TV viewing experience will reach new levels. The SHARP LC40M550M has Full HD resolution which is an ideal platform to play high definition games or watch Blu-ray movies. This AQUOS Series LCD TV is made to be energy efficient and requires a power supply of 110 - 240 V, 50/60 Hz to start operation. The SHARP Full HDTV consumes a power of 119 W in operation and in standby mode, the energy usage by the TV is only 0.6 W. Now you can enjoy your favorite programs on the SHARP LC40M550M without worrying about high electricity bills. Design Crafted to suit any interiors it is placed in, the SHARP LCD TV has a simplistic yet elegant design. The LC40M550M TV sports a 40 inch screen with a resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels that displays visuals in superb clarity. You can have cinema-like widescreen viewing on the TV as it has an aspect ratio of 16:9. The dual-toned bottom bezel accommodates the control buttons of the TV that make it more convenient. A square stand that comes with the TV lends the device to be more functional. When placed on the stand, the SHARP LC40M550M measures 980 x 681 x 314 mm and tips the scales at 15.5 kg. Video and Audio Equipped with modern-age video enhancing technologies, the SHARP LC40M550M promises to deliver optimum quality pictures every time you switch it on. The Advanced OPC (Optical Picture Control) modifies the screen display in accordance with the lighting conditions of the room, so as to give you premium class visuals. This function also helps in reducing the power consumption of the television. Other features that work toward augmenting your viewing experience include 3D Comb Filter and 1080/24P Signal Input. For a complete viewing experience, the audio is as crucial as is the video. The 2 built-in speakers of the SHARP LC40M550M are well equipped with sound features to deliver crystal clear sound that complement the brilliant visual quality of the television. Having a combined sound power output of 20 W, the speakers provide theater-like surround sound quality, thanks to the presence of SRS TruSurround HD technology. The audio in this Full HD LCD TV is heightened by the inclusion of NICAM Stereo system. The Clear Voice technology in the SHARP AQUOS television minimizes the background sound and increases the vocals, so that you don’t miss any important dialogs. The Digital Amplifier strengthens the sound signals for the correct impact, while for pumping up the bass tones, there is a Bass Enhancer in the SHARP LC40M550M. Features and Connectivity The sundry collection of connectivity ports in this SHARP LCD television makes it more convenient for you to connect other audio video devices to it. Among the important ports are 3 HDMI ports, 1 USB port, 1 Headphone Jack and a Component Video Input. You can connect your pen drive or hard disk drive to the USB port of the SHARP LC40M550M and view videos, movies, images or listen to music stored in them on the TV screen. The Full HDTV from SHARP also offers a fair share of utility functions that filter the manual settings for you. These include Teletext, OSD Language, No-signal Off and No-operation Off. Buying Tips Placement of a television is important a factor to consider as is its price and features tagged on it. You can choose to place the SHARP LC40M550M either on its stand or hang it on your wall. This Full HD LCD TV has a wide viewing angle of 176 degree that gives you the freedom to sit anywhere in the room and still enjoy a good view of the TV.

productBaseInfoV1.title: SAMSUNG Basic Smart 100 cm (40 inch) Full HD LED TV(40M5100)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Experience mesmerizing entertainment on this Samsung 80 cm (32) Full HD Basic Smart LED TV. Thanks to the Smart Convergence technology of this Samsung Joy Connect TV, you can now mirror your smartphone's content (YouTube, Netflix, HotStar, Videos, Photos) wirelessly. Use your smartphone data (3G/4G/Wi-Fi) connection to view your chosen content on a larger screen with the Screen Mirroring feature. The Bluetooth two-way audio feature lets you pair your smartphone with this Samsung TV to make it a powerful Bluetooth speaker. You can also privately listen to the TV's audio on headphones connected to your smartphone. Its Smart Share feature lets you wirelessly share content between your smartphone and the USB device connected to it. This product does not come with any In-built apps/web Browser or operating system.

Connect DVD Player Video Input & Audio Input (L&R) to the TV. 2. Press the PLAY button on DVD player. VIDEO INPUT 1. Connect the composite outputs VIDEO out of VCR/Cable receiver to V1deo1, Video2. 2. Connect audio outputs (L,R) of a DVD player to the audio input.AV1.AV2,For Audio use R 1 & L1 Audio Input 3. Press the PLAY button on the VCR/DVD. VGA lNPUT : 1. Connect the VGN PC cable from the monitor output socket of the PC to the VGN/PC IN socket of the TV. 2. Connect the audio cable from the PC to the VGN/PC AUDIO IN of the set. 3. Switch on the PC and PC screen appears on the set The set can be operated as PC monitor . HOMI INPUT : 1.Connect the HDMI(High-Definition Multimedia Interface} cable from the DVD HDMI output socket to the HDMI socket (HOMl1,HOMl2 or HOMl3-Optional) on the TV. 2. Set HDMI mode in DVD (Refer User Manual of DVD) by using HDMI cable. AV OUT : This connection is used for connecting the TV/AV from TV SET 1 to TV SET 2. This port uses for Poer Audio function and connect to multimedia Home Theater (PA +/- key on remote are for controlling media volume). MULTIMEDIA : Connect/Insert standard USB and select Use source on source OSD by pressing SOURCE key Press OK I Right key on remote, connected USB are listed, Select USB with UP/Down keys and press OK to enter In selected USB Multimedia Similarly front panel keys CH +/-. and VOL +/.can be used as UP/Down and Left Right keys on remote respective.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Panasonic VIERA 32 Inches HD LCD TH-L32C22D Television(TH-L32C22D)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Your search for an LCD TV with advanced features and smart technologies comes to an end with the Panasonic TH-L32C22. The affordable price tag further makes this high definition television a much desirable piece to own. This C Series LCD TV from Panasonic delivers superior quality sound and picture to take your viewing experience to the next level. Designed to consume energy judiciously, the Panasonic TH-L32C22 needs to be plugged to a power source of AC 110 - 240 V, 50/60Hz to start functioning. The 32 incher boasts of low power consumption, using only 78 W of energy in operational mode. Design Sporting a unique design with the speakers placed on the side of the screen, this Panasonic LCD TV has bulged-out sides, which also give enough room for handling the device. The Panasonic TH-L32C22 has a 32 inch screen with a native screen resolution of 1366 x 768 pixels that display pictures in utmost clarity. The LCD TV comes with a square stand atop which the television sits measuring 920 x 565 x 204 mm. Fitted with an IPS Alpha LCD Panel, the Panasonic TH-L32C22 promises to offer excellent color reproduction and eliminate slow response time and dual layered images. This results in crystal clear visuals delivered by the HDTV. The television also has 16:9 aspect ratio to provide you with wide screen entertainment. Video and Audio Using CCFL backlight technology, the Panasonic TH-L32C22 boasts of several video enhancing features that will make your TV viewing sessions more worthwhile. Enjoy flicker-free viewing of action movies or fast paced Grand Prix races as this LCD TV features Motion Focus Technology, which utilizes blinking backlight to produce smoother motion pictures. The Panasonic TH-L32C22 has 300 Lines Moving Picture Resolution that is a great feature for gamers as it reduces blur in images, giving immensely clear visuals. The TV renders videos and movies in their original frame rate of 24 frames per second via the 24p Smooth Playback option, so that you can have a complete theater-like experience sitting right in your couch. The conspicuously visible dual speakers on either side of the TV screen offer brilliant quality sound that complement the stunning picture quality of the Panasonic TH-L32C22. With a combined sound power output of 30 W and V-Audio Surround technology, the LCD TV delivers cinema-like surround sound experience. Features and Connectivity Equipped with standard connectivity features, the Panasonic TH-L32C22 simplifies your home entertainment setup, eliminating the mess of too many wires dangling around your TV set. The single HDMI port in the TV allows connection of other audio-video devices via the VIERA Link technology and their unified control through the TV’s remote control. The PC Input allows easy connectivity to your computer, turning the TV to your monitor. Other important connectivity terminals include one each of Composite Video and Component Video inputs. The VIERA Tools user interface of the Panasonic TH-L32C22 makes it convenient for you to access important functions from one single button in the remote control. Panasonic has provided this LCD TV with a Game Mode that allows you to enjoy your gaming sessions to the hilt. This mode reduces wobbling effect and produces sharper dark images for more clarity. Other utility features present in the Panasonic TH-L32C22 include On/Off Timer and Child Lock that enhance your user experience. Buying Tips If you’re looking for a TV to place in your bedroom, then you could opt for the Panasonic TH-L32C22. Placing the TV at least 10 feet away from your bed or seating area will give you a wholesome view. This LCD TV has a wide viewing angle of 178 degree that gives you the freedom to sit in any corner of the room and yet have a clear view of the image. Now you can enjoy your choicest programs with all of your family members, without compromising on the viewing quality.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Sharp (40 inch) Full HD LED TV(LC40LE430M)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Unwind yourself after a hard day’s work with your favorite TV shows on the SHARP LC40LE430M, which is crafted to suit your entertainment needs. With crystal clear picture transmission, this SHARP AQUOS series television is the ideal platform to enjoy the soccer matches. The LC40LE430M LCD TV has Full HD resolution so that you don’t miss out any visual detail. The LED backlight of the SHARP LC40LE430M renders it to be energy efficient and saves you from getting high electricity bills. This Full HDTV requires to be plugged into a power source of 110 - 240 V, 50/60 Hz for efficient functioning. The TV uses power judiciously and consumes 119 W of energy in operational mode and only 1 W in standby mode. Design Sporting a neat and elegant design, the SHARP LC40LE430M blends in any interior seamlessly. The 40 inch screen size of the LCD TV displays pictures in the native resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels. A classic black bezel surrounds the TV screen and adds more functionality and glamour to the appearance of the television. A square stand is used to mount the television for a better view. The SHARP LC40LE430M stands tall measuring 980 x 665 x 256 mm and weighs 15.5 kg, when placed on the stand. Video and Audio Enjoy brilliant quality videos and pictures in this Full HDTV from SHARP as it boasts of 1080/24P Signal Input, which showcases visuals in high definition, irrespective of the source. For reducing image artifacts on the LC40LE430M LCD TV, SHARP has packed in a 3D Comb Filter in the television. This smart creation from SHARP features the OPC (Optical Picture Control) technology that adjusts the display brightness of the TV automatically as per the surrounding light conditions. This allows minimal usage of energy as well as gives a good viewing angle that does not put any strain on your eyes. For handling the audio in this LC40LE430M, SHARP has fitted 2 built-in speakers in this Full HDTV, that have a combined sound power output of 20 W. The NICAM Stereo system in the TV provides clear acoustics with accurate details. For delivering theater-like surround sound at home, the SHARP LCD TV has the SRS TruSurround HD technology loaded into it. With the SHARP LC40LE430M, you are assured of hearing every dialog, thanks to the inclusion of Clear Voice technology. No more will loud background noise come between you and the crucial dialogs in the movie. This is supported by the Digital Amplifier that augments the sound quality. For amplified bass sound, there is a Bass Enhancer fitted into this SHARP LCD television. Features and Connectivity Experience seamless connectivity with the SHARP LC40LE430M that has all the standard connectivity options which will streamline your home entertainment hub. Through the 3 HDMI ports, you can transfer high definition content to the TV from other compatible devices like Blu-ray players or camcorders. There is a USB port in the LCD TV that allows connection of pen drives or hard disk drives. You can instantly watch videos, movies, image slideshows and listen to music stored in those devices on the TV screen. Other essential ports included in the SHARP LC40LE430M are 1 Component Video Input, 1 PC-In, 1 Headphone Jack, 1 RS-232C, 1 PC Analogue Input and 2 Video Inputs. Utility features such as Teletext and OSD Language are also present in the TV that take your viewing experience to the next level. Buying Tips Where you place your TV is important for a comfortable viewing. Hanging the television on the wall is a good idea if you are short of space in the room. The SHARP LC40LE430M’s viewing angle of 176 degree makes it convenient for you to sit in any corner of the room and yet enjoy a comfortable view of the TV. For an enhanced viewing experience, place this 40 incher at least 10 feet away from your seating area.

productBaseInfoV1.title: SAMSUNG (32 inch) HD Ready LED TV(UA32EH4000)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Televisions these days have become an appliance that every household has. From the more common CRT televisions, to expensive Plasma flat screens and LCD displays, you can be sure that almost every house has one. Samsung is just one such brand that constantly strives to improve on the technology and features that they incorporate into the televisions they design and manufacture. Design and Features This flawlessly designed television from Samsung hails from the 4 series of the brand and aims to be your one-stop-shop for all your entertainment needs. Equipped with an LED display, the 32 inch screen features a resolution of 1366 x 768 pixels that can play your favourite Oscar winning movies as well as Emmy winning TV shows in high definition. The HD Ready Samsung UA32EH4000 television is also equipped with Samsung’s patented Wide Colour Enhancer Plus to improve on picture clarity and viewing angle. The advanced picture quality improvement algorithm is used to uncover hidden details and give you a wider and deeper spectrum of colours. In addition, the 32 inch Samsung LED HD television features the Vesa Wall Mount Support that equips you to take the 5.7 kg television off a table or stand and stylishly place it on the wall. This feature, coupled with the classy narrow bezel, undoubtedly adds a touch of sophistication and class to any TV viewing room of yours. The UA32EH4000 television from the 4 series of Samsung is also equipped with Triple Protector technology that prevents the television from being affected by electrical surges, lightning and excess humidity. Video and Audio The Samsung television really does give you a viewing experience that would be very hard to forget. The designers of the 4 series Samsung UA32EH4000 LED 32 inch HD television have equipped it with state-of-the-art picture boosting technologies like a Digital Noise Filter and a 50 Hz Clear Motion Rate. What these features give you is a crystal-clear and undistorted flow of images when viewing fast paced action thrillers or graphics demanding console based games.  Adding to your surreal motion picture experience is the amazing sound field that the Samsung television creates through its 2 built-in Down Firing and Full Range speakers. Featuring the latest sound technology like Dolby Digital Plus, Dolby Pulse and SRS TheatreSound, the entertainment system produces 20 W of total speaker power output RMS to keep you captivated and immersed in the action for hours on end. Connectivity If you often find yourself annoyed by the repeated movies your cable operator and set-top box keeps airing, the video enabled USB 2.0 port that the Samsung 32 inch TV is equipped with enables you to connect and play just the kind of media content you like. Furthermore, the television also features 2 HDMI ports that enable you to connect appliances like an Xbox or Blu-Ray player. Especially if you have a gaming console, the television's Game Mode combined with the HDMI port should have you mesmerized and completely immersed in the video games you play. In addition, there are also a host of other ports to meet just every one of your connectivity requirements. For example, the television includes a Composite Video Input, a Component Video Input, a Digital Audio Output (Optical) and a headphone jack that can be used at nights when you don’t want to wake up the family. Whichever way you look at it the 32 inch LED HD Samsung TV makes for an extremely efficient and value-for-money buy, and is sure to keep you thoroughly entertained through movies, television shows and HD gaming experiences, for many years to come.

productBaseInfoV1.title: SAMSUNG (19 inch) HD Ready LED TV(LA19D400E1)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Here is your chance to completely redefine your TV viewing experience with the LA19D400E1 LCD TV from Samsung. This 19 inch HD LCD TV from Samsung integrates a horde of innovative technologies and smart features, tastefully integrated into a stylish body design to meet all of your digital video entertainment needs from intense HD movies to your favourite TV shows. This Planet First Certified HD television works with a power supply of AC 100 - 240 V, 50 / 60 Hz and consumes less than 1 W of power while in standby mode, giving you tension-free entertainment without having to constantly worry about high power consumption. Design This Series 4 Samsung LCD TV flaunts a bold 19 inch HD display with a resolution of 1366 x 768 pixels and a 16:9 aspect ratio. The high glossy screen is brilliantly integrated with a slim bezel to maintain a slim profile, which allows you to wall mount the TV just like a picture frame giving you more space in the room as well as an elevated style statement. With a weight of 3.8 kg and 461.3 x 299.7 x 61.2 mm dimensions, this TV can also be placed on a table top using its detachable round stand. Video and Audio Packed with advanced audio and video processing technologies, the Samsung HD LCD TV offers you unlimited entertainment while striking the perfect balance between form and function. The TVs DNIe+ Engine empowers the system to produce flicker-free images with superb clarity and perfect brightness. This proprietary picture engine technology uses Contrast Enhancer, Motion Optimizer and Colour Optimizer to boost the overall picture quality. The Samsung LA19D400E1 HD TV comes with Wide Colour Enhancing technology, which saturates each pixel until it achieves the true colour and life-like luminescence. The High Dynamic Contrast Ratio and 50Hz Clear Motion Rate features deliver high quality images without motion blur and distortion. You can now watch fast-paced action movies and dynamic sport videos with a more intense and immersive experience. The audio system on this Series 4 Samsung television consists of dual inbuilt Down Firing and Full Range speakers which give you a combined audio output power up to 6 W RMS. The SRS TheatreSound system boosts your entire digital entertainment with high quality surround sound. Features and Connectivity When it comes to external connectivity, the 19 inch Samsung LCD TV gives so much for a TV in its price bracket.  An HDMI port enables you to connect compatible HD devices like DVD Player, Home Theatre, Gaming Console and PC to enjoy your preferred video and audio in HD quality. Moreover, with the Anynet+ technology, you can control all compatible Samsung audio and video devices connected via HDMI with a single remote control unit. This budget-friendly HD TV comes with a high-speed 2.0 USB port, and the ConnectShare feature lets you enjoy JPEG images on the TV screen. The Samsung television also has ancillary connectivity features like Composite Video Input, Component Video Input, PC Audio In, Headphone Jack, PC In, RF Connection Input and DVI Audio Input. Buying Tips There are quite a few variables to be taken into account before you settle in on an LCD TV. Planned placement and better connectivity options help you to get the most out of your television. Loaded with the latest in audio, video and connectivity technologies, this 19 inch Samsung TV makes a very practical and aesthetic addition to your entertainment or lounge areas where you get to enjoy all the goodness of this wall mounted LCD TV. You can also opt for a table mount for this TV with its detachable stand while making sure that you leave enough space on sides and rear end for better ventilation and easy external connectivity. The HDMI connectivity transmits HD video and audio through a single cable, thus reducing the number of wires coiled around the TV.

productBaseInfoV1.title: Haier (18.5 inch) HD Ready LED TV(LE19C430)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: The LE19C430 comes from the highly successful Series of LED TVs from Haier that is sure to propel all your video entertainment with the highest clarity and absolute detail. The advent of HD support lets you enjoy all your favourite videos in high definition. This Haier 18.5 inch LED television requires a power supply of 110 - 240 V, 50/60 Hz and is designed for minimal energy usage, thus giving you a worry free digital video entertainment. Design The very stylish and sleek design of this HD LED television is sure to create a visually positive impact to any room in which it is showcased. Ideal for a studio apartment or as a secondary TV for your home, this Haier LED TV comes with an 18.5 inch screen which has a display resolution of 1366 x 768 pixels and 16:9 aspect ratio. This gives this  LED TV the ability to project amazing visuals with stunning clarity, while still strongly contributing to the aesthetic value of its immediate surroundings. As an epitome of form and function, this Haier LED TV with its lightweight body components and its slim and very manoeuvrable dimensions manages to take up very little space in your room, especially when its wall-mount option is used.  Video and Audio This extremely budget-friendly LED television from Haier uses the ultra-efficient 3D Comb Filter that helps to automatically compensate for any detail and colour loss. The eco-friendly LED backlighting on this Haier HD LED TV uniformly illuminated the entire viewing surface thus enhancing the TV's capability to deliver sharp pictures with natural and life-like colours. This LED backlighting feature also helps this Haier LED TV to maintain a slim profile, while also minimizing the TVs operational power consumption. The audio capability of this Haier HD LED TV is driven by the NICAM Stereo sound system which upgrades mono audio TV signals to stereo sound for the benefit of your viewing experience. This precisely designed audio management system helps deliver top notch quality audio output through its built-in 2 speaker system to accompany your high definition video. This 2 built-in speaker system on this Haier LED TV has a combined sound power output of 6 W, giving it the ability to deliver amazing clear theatre-like surround sound while still being in the comfort of your own home. Features and Connectivity The Haier HD LED LE19C430 TV features a wide range of connectivity options that is sure to help you streamline your home entertainment setup. This LED TV comes with 2 HDMI ports that lets you play high definition digital content from other audio-visual devices at a great speed. It also lets you connect the TV to a DVD player, Blu-Ray player, high-end gaming consoles and home theatre systems for a more efficiently integrated entertainment arrangement. The other connectivity terminals present on this LED TV include a Composite Video Input for VCR or low-end DVD players, a Component Video Input for newer DVD players and an RF connection input. There is also a high-speed USB 2.0 port that lets you connect and access digital media information from any USB enabled external storage device. This lets you directly play audio, video and digital images on the TV from an external hard disc or a USB flash drive. Buying Tips This HD LED TV gives you good flexibility in terms of placement allowing you to either wall-mount or table-mount the TV depending on your convenience. Mounting the TV on the wall will give you a lot more space and also add a great deal of sophistication to the entire room. If you are placing the TV on its stand, make sure that you leave enough space on the sides and rear for better ventilation and connectivity. Thanks to this TV’s dynamic LED backlighting, all colours and shades are evenly reproduced on the viewing surface.
